@tpoole00 @yvrwx @SFU if they can't take care of the roads on time then what happened today can happen again. :/
Snowfall Warning issued. Please watch out for the roads tonight if u can so students can make it to exams tomorrow! @sfu #bcstorm #snow #sfu
@vcmemory0107 they were able to today. There was free parking and it is snowing tonight again, so I guess it will be the same thing
It is snowing again at @sfu burnaby Please be cautious as roads are icing up, temperatures will be low tomorrow morning! #bcstorm #snow #sfu
Only a little colder and we would be screwed again with exams... #bcstorm #sfu
@Wonderlestjen It is just rain for now .. should be ok :)

@SFU Thanks.
@Eff_T33 @furtadomatthew It is hard to clear it that fast when it snows that much! People come from all over the place, it is just not safe.
@Eff_T33 That "how about now?" was when it started to snow terribly. They would not say a word and poor people still trying to come up!
@Eff_T33 They are, but without the two hour notice. I do not. I am just pissed at how poorly they handle everything.
@SFU what about those living in UniverCity ?
@furtadomatthew @Eff_T33 Everyone wants to take the exams... but while being safe and not stuck in this bad weather!!

Two days in a row... last minute notice. Students stuck going down in the bad weather because of lack of responsibility from @SFU. #bcstorm

@NiamhAnderson They finally closed campus. Still late, no two hour notice. Students were already trying to come up and r stuck on production
You are late, again.. at least better than yesterday! https://t.co/1QK7Ell4ln
@ruixu38 @SFU @TransLink People stuck at production @CKNW
@NiamhAnderson @CKNW A pleasure talking with you.
@CKNW @NiamhAnderson the noon exams start trying to get home. Students at production have been waiting for close to an hour in cold temps.
@CKNW @NiamhAnderson This is unacceptable. Bus services have been disrupted. And it is going to be worse once students coming out from (1/2)
HAHA and @SFU still wants to host exams... There is going to be chaos with students going up and down in the middle… https://t.co/VoLrR8EBoW

@SFU WHAT HAPPENED WITH THE TWO HOUR NOTICE??
Students coming out of the 12pm exam are going to have difficulties getting off campus. Putting students safety at risk.. #sfu #bcstorm

@iamafreed17 @SFU And forecast for up the mountain is still different, lower temperatures. It is snowing a lot right now.
@sfu what's the point of having exams if so many of the students don't live considerably close (mountain foot) to make it there!!? #bcstorm
@sfu Nobody should be willing to risk their life or have a really stressful commute for a piece of paper. There are so many alternatives.
@EstherVerheyen @SFU they are making announcements last minute. Really annoying and wasting people's time and risking safety.
@r_bittner @SFU I agree. That two hour notice has to be made preventatively, not last minute when transportation is already a disaster!!
